Sentencas: A novel direct ammonia intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell based integrated system is developed, analyzed and proposed for clean rail electric transportation.
Titulo: A new direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine based integrated system for electric rail transportation

Sentencas: The present multigenerational system provides all the required energy demands of a passenger locomotive.
Titulo: A new direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine based integrated system for electric rail transportation

Sentencas: This system is studied using a validated thermodynamic model to evaluate its energy and exergy efficiencies and power outputs.
Titulo: A new direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine based integrated system for electric rail transportation

Sentencas: Parametric studies are performed to investigate the system in more depth, thermodynamically.
Titulo: A new direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine based integrated system for electric rail transportation

Sentencas: Based on these, the integrated system can reach optimized energy and exergy efficiency values of 71.0% and 76.8%, respectively.
Titulo: A new direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine based integrated system for electric rail transportation

Sentencas: The use of supercritical ammonia-organic Rankine cycle improves both energy and exergy efficiencies by 12.9% and 11.8%, respectively compared to an ammonia based SOFC-GT system.
Titulo: A new direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine based integrated system for electric rail transportation

Sentencas: These values are comparable to typical methane-based systems and the use of ammonia eliminates CO2 emissions.
Titulo: A new direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine based integrated system for electric rail transportation
